credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
dimensions:
sheet: 11 x 8 1/2 in. (27.9 x 21.6 cm)
Other (envelope): 8.9 x 15.9 cm (3 1/2 x 6 1/4 in.)
title: Letter from Edith Glackens to Mr. and Mrs. Charles Prendergast (New York City)
description: No letterhead. A single one sided sheet with an envelope. No letterhead on the envelope.  Letter pertains to Charles' exhibition and an invitation to visit her.
